Zahra Ben mime (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 30 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Iraq-Tunisian na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ngosi na onye nlereanya
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na Hawa Baghdad
A mụrụ ya na Baghdad site na nna onye Tunisia si Sousse na nne Iraq si Al Diwaniyah
Ọ biri na Baghdad ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ isii wee soro nna ya kwaga Damaskọs na Siria ebe ọ biri afọ iri na atọ nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 2007, ọ kwagara Tunisia ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nlereanya na-apụta na vidiyo egwu na mgbasa ozi na na afo 2009

N'afọ 2011, ọ ghọrọ onye ngosi na onye na-emepụta ihe na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ TV Tunisia dị ka El Watania 1 na Ettounsiya TV N'afọ 2017, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro TV nke Tunisia The Vortex Ọrụ ya kachasị pụta ìhè bụ na usoro TV nke Iraq Hawa Baghdad nke gosipụtara na na afo 2019
Ya na onye America na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Esser West pụtara, ma merie Golden Crescent Award maka onye na-eto eto kacha mma na-eme ihe nkiri Iraq.
Her husband is Tunisian, and the couple have three children (two sons and one daughter)
O nwetara citizenship nke Iraqi na afo 2019. She participated in the Iraqi protests in 2019.
